and t.soycapacity=#{soycapacity} and t.ghlineheight=#{ghlineheight} and t.storetec=#{storetec} and t.defgrainid=#{defgrainid} and t.defgrainattrid=#{defgrainattrid} and t.defproducingyear=#{defproducingyear} and t.videoid1=#{videoid1} and t.videoid2=#{videoid2} and t.videoid3=#{videoid3} and t.effectcapacity=#{effectcapacity} and t.eavesheight=#{eavesheight} and t.storagearea=#{storagearea} and t.doorlength=#{doorlength} and t.doorwidth=#{doorwidth} and t.doorheight=#{doorheight} and t.ductlength=#{ductlength} and t.ductwidth=#{ductwidth} and t.ductheight=#{ductheight} and t.ductcount=#{ductcount} and t.position_x=#{position_x} and t.position_y=#{position_y} and t.divwidth=#{divwidth} and t.divheight=#{divheight} and t.divtype=#{divtype} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime}
mapper.update: update l_storage set storageid=storageid ,position_x=#{position_x} ,position_y=#{position_y} ,divwidth=#{divwidth} ,divheight=#{divheight} ,divtype=#{divtype} where storageid=#{storageid}
mapper.select: select * from l_video where 1=1 and graindepotid=#{graindepotid}
